location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Acting Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that Captain George Forster Sadlier has been sent on a special mission to join Ibraham Pasha [Ibrāhim Pāshā], commanding the Turkish troops near the western shores of the Persian Gulf. It instructs the Resident to provide him with every assistance required to fulfil his mission.
